A new milestone has been reached!

There are 127 resources currently available.
Collections / Observations / ..


There are now 3,423,302 specimen occurrences recorded on the IPT.
This represents 57,436 taxa and 10,005 observations.


[Access the IPT](https://data.canadensys.net/ipt/){: .button .is-primary}

1,829,943 plant specimens,

1,182,650 insect specimens
